Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object

    Matrix Library

    Custom Java library built to provide Matrix math and operations for simple neural network
    Since:
    3 November 2018
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Bailey Pelletier

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix(int rows, int cols)
      Constructs a Zero matrix with the given parameters
      Matrix(int rows, int cols, boolean ident)
      Constructs a Zero matrix with the given parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Matrix

        public Matrix(int rows,
              int cols,
              boolean ident)
        Constructs a Zero matrix with the given parameters. Will construct a matrix with m leading ones with m representing the number of rows in an mxn matrix.
        Parameters:
        rows - Number of rows
        cols - Number of columns
        ident - Sets if constructor builds identity matrix

      • Matrix

        public Matrix(int rows,
              int cols)
        Constructs a Zero matrix with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        rows - Number of rows
        cols - Number of columns

    • Method Detail

      • fromArrary

        public static Matrix fromArrary(double[] arr)
        Returns a vector matrix based on a 1D Array
        Parameters:
        arr - 1D Array to be converted to column vector
        Returns:
        matrix Column vector represented as a matrix (nx1)

      • toArrary

        public static double[] toArrary(Matrix a)
        Returns an array based on a column vector
        Parameters:
        a - Column vector matrix (nx1)
        Returns:
        arr[] 1D Array

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of a matrix object
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string String representing each element

      • initialRand

        public void initialRand()
        Initializes each value of a matrix between 0 and 10 Rounds to 3 decimal places

      • initialRandInt

        public void initialRandInt()
        Initializes each value of a matrix between 0 and 10 Truncated when casted to ints

      • initialSimple

        public void initialSimple()
        Initializes each value of a matrix starting at 1 and counting up

      • getMinorMatrix

        public Matrix getMinorMatrix(int iRow,
                             int jCol)
        Returns a minor matrix Aij based on matrix passed in
        Parameters:
        iRow - ith Row to eliminate
        jCol - jth Col to eliminate
        Returns:
        matrix Minor matrix

      • getTranspose

        public Matrix getTranspose()
        Returns a transposed matrix based on calling object
        Returns:
        matrix Transposed matrix

      • getInverse

        public Matrix getInverse()
        Returns the inverse of the calling Matrix object
        * Currently only works with 2x2 Matricies!
        Returns:
        matrix Inversed matrix

        public static Matrix add(Matrix a,
                         Matrix b)
        Adds elements of two matrices with the same dimensions and returns the sum.

        b - Col index
        Returns:

      • subtract

        public static Matrix subtract(Matrix a,
                              Matrix b)
        Subtracts elements of two matrices with the same dimensions and returns the sum. c = (a - b)
        Parameters:
        a - Row index
        b - Col index
        Returns:
        matrix Value to set to

      • add

        public void add(double amount)
        Adds a certain number to each element in a matrix
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to add to each cell

      • mult

        public void mult(double scalar)
        Multiplies every entry by a scalar
        Parameters:
        scalar - Scalar to multiply by

      • mult

        public static Matrix mult(Matrix a,
                          Matrix b)
        Returns the Hadamard product of two matricies. Each element is multiplied by its respective element of the other matrix
        Parameters:
        a - 1st Matrix
        b - 2nd Matrix
        Returns:
        matrix Hadamard Product

      • dot

        public static Matrix dot(Matrix a,
                         Matrix b)
        Returns the dot product between mxn and nxk matricies. # of columns of first matrix must match # of rows second matrix.
        Parameters:
        a - 1st Matrix
        b - 2nd Matrix
        Returns:
        matrix Dot product

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
